ERROR.CoreMissing: Module vtta-core is missing and required for VTTA Tokens to function. Please install and enable it to continue.
ERROR.CoreDisabled: Module vtta-core is installed, but disabled. You can find it in your module list labeled Virtual Tabletop Assets (VTTA), please enable it to use VTTA Tokens.
SETTING.defaultNPCFrame.label: Default border frame image for Non-player characters
SETTING.defaultNPCFrame.hint: Select an image to be loaded as a default frame
SETTING.defaultPCFrame.label: Default border frame image for Player characters
SETTING.defaultPCFrame.hint: Select an image to be loaded as a default frame
SETTING.tokenSize.label: Size of the generated token
SETTING.tokenSize.hint: Being quadratic, both width and height are the same value in pixels
SETTING.automaticTokenGeneration.label: Auto-generate token images
SETTING.automaticTokenGeneration.hint: Based on the configured token frame, a token will be automatically generated when you create an Actor that already has a valid actor image applied. Mainly used for VTTA-based imports.
SETTING.forceDefaultPathOnVTTServer.labe: Save VTT server images in the default path every time
SETTING.forceDefaultPathOnVTTServer.hint: When saving a token, do not attempt to save in the same directory as the source image; instead save to the default actor-images path (specified above). Useful to keep generated files out of system or module directories.
BLEND_MODE.SOURCE_OVER.description: This is the default blend mode and draws new shapes on top of the existing canvas content.
BLEND_MODE.SOURCE_IN.description: The new shape is drawn only where both the new shape and the destination canvas overlap. Everything else is made transparent.
BLEND_MODE.SOURCE_OUT.description: The new shape is drawn where it doesn't overlap the existing canvas content.
BLEND_MODE.SOURCE_ATOP.description: The new shape is only drawn where it overlaps the existing canvas content.
BLEND_MODE.DESTINATION_OVER.description: New shapes are drawn behind the existing canvas content.
BLEND_MODE.DESTINATION_IN.description: The existing canvas content is kept where both the new shape and existing canvas content overlap. Everything else is made transparent.
BLEND_MODE.DESTINATION_OUT.description: The existing content is kept where it doesn't overlap the new shape.
BLEND_MODE.DESTINATION_ATOP.description: The existing canvas is only kept where it overlaps the new shape. The new shape is drawn behind the canvas content.
BLEND_MODE.LIGHTER.description: Where both shapes overlap the color is determined by adding color values.
BLEND_MODE.COPY.description: Only the new shape is shown.
BLEND_MODE.XOR.description: Shapes are made transparent where both overlap and drawn normal everywhere else.
BLEND_MODE.MULTIPLY.description: The pixels are of the top layer are multiplied with the corresponding pixel of the bottom layer. A darker picture is the result.
BLEND_MODE.SCREEN.description: The pixels are inverted, multiplied, and inverted again. A lighter picture is the result (opposite of multiply)
BLEND_MODE.OVERLAY.description: A combination of multiply and screen. Dark parts on the base layer become darker, and light parts become lighter.
BLEND_MODE.DARKEN.description: Retains the darkest pixels of both layers.
BLEND_MODE.LIGHTEN.description: Retains the lightest pixels of both layers.
BLEND_MODE.COLOR_DODGE.description: Divides the bottom layer by the inverted top layer.
BLEND_MODE.COLOR_BURN.description: Divides the inverted bottom layer by the top layer, and then inverts the result.
BLEND_MODE.HARD_LIGHT.description: A combination of multiply and screen like overlay, but with top and bottom layer swapped.
BLEND_MODE.SOFT_LIGHT.description: A softer version of hard-light. Pure black or white does not result in pure black or white.
BLEND_MODE.DIFFERENCE.description: Subtracts the bottom layer from the top layer or the other way round to always get a positive value.
BLEND_MODE.EXCLUSION.description: Like difference, but with lower contrast.
BLEND_MODE.HUE.description: Preserves the luma and chroma of the bottom layer, while adopting the hue of the top layer.
BLEND_MODE.SATURATION.description: Preserves the luma and hue of the bottom layer, while adopting the chroma of the top layer.
BLEND_MODE.COLOR.description: Preserves the luma of the bottom layer, while adopting the hue and chroma of the top layer.
BLEND_MODE.LUMINOSITY.description: Preserves the hue and chroma of the bottom layer, while adopting the luma of the top layer.
